Articles.Content:
Hello KSP community, I've been playing KSP for about a year but then I lost interest and stopped playing for 5 months. Now because of the new ARM update and the collaboration with NASA I decided to start playing again and this time I also registered to the forums

My first project will be a base on a big (C-, D-, or E-class) asteroid so if you have any tips or ideas please tell me!
Welcome to the forums! The biggest suggestion would be to pack on plenty of fuel and thrust. It might sound trivially obvious, but you'd be surprised at how heavy some of those bigger rocks can be
Welcome aboard! If you plan on bringing the asteroid home, just remember to pack a lot of chutes.
G'day. Welcome to the forums! Good luck with your asteroid base.
